    • Uses of CommonCharacter in view.viewGUICharecteres

      Subclasses of CommonCharacter in view.viewGUICharecteres 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnimCharacter
      Animation character class, extending CommonCharacter and setting the setAnimation flag as true and overrides the default painter for the animation painter.
      class  BallCharacter
      Ball character class, extending CommonCharacter and overrides the default painter for the a ball character, and setting the ball color(if its set).
      class  PicCharacter
      Picture character class, extending CommonCharacter and overrides the default painter for the a picture painter, while scaling the recievd image.
